messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THIS IS A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

mentions.candidate: With your help Phyllis Walker, together we can get it right.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. While there is enormous opportunity for Britain as we leave the European Union, if we don’t get the Brexit deal right, your economic security and prosperity will be put at risk. By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.
issues.economy: I believe that with dedication and hard work, we can make a success of Brexit and bring our country together - building a stronger economy that creates secure and well-paid jobs, where every child gets a good school place and working people can buy a home of their own.
issues.labourEmployment: I believe that with dedication and hard work, we can make a success of Brexit and bring our country together - building a stronger economy that creates secure and well-paid jobs.

quotes.text: LABOUR PLOTS BREXIT DEAL WITH OTHER PARTIES IF TORIES DON’T WIN ELECTION MAJORITY

images.caption: THERESA MAY AND JAMES DUDDRIDGE - STRONG AND STABLE LEADERSHIP FOR ROCHFORD AND SOUTHEND EAST AND FOR BRITAIN

examples: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
With your help Phyllis Walker, together we can get it right.
Labour under Jeremy Corbyn are a shambles and he would embarrass Britain in Brussels and risk our economic security.
Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.
I believe that with dedication and hard work, we can make a success of Brexit and bring our country together - building a stronger economy that creates secure and well-paid jobs.

personalStories.story: With your help Phyllis Walker, together we can get it right.

examples: But there are only two people who can possibly be Prime Minister after the election to negotiate Brexit – me or Jeremy Corbyn.
Labour under Jeremy Corbyn are a shambles and he would embarrass Britain in Brussels and risk our economic security.
